Verses: 1 saalomon Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaiyum Than Aramanaiyaiyum Katta Irubadhu Varushakaalam Sendrapinbu,
2 eeraam Thanakkuk Koduththirundha Pattanangalai Saalomon Katti, Avaigalil Isravel Puththiraraik Kudiyetrinaan.
3 pinbu Saalomon Aamaadhsobaavukkup Poi, Adhai Jeyiththaan.
4 avan Vanaandharaththilulla Thadhmoraiyum, Aamaaththesaththile Rasthukkalin Pattanangal Anaiththaiyum Kattinaan.
5 saalomon Melpeththoronaiyum, Keezhppeththoronaiyum, Alangangalum Kadhavugalum Thaazhppaalgalumulla Aranaana Pattanangalaagak Katti,

6 paalaaththaiyum, Thanakku Irukkira Rasthukkalai Vaikkum Sagala Pattanangalaiyum, Radhangal Irukkum Sagala Pattanangalaiyum, Kudhiraiveerar Irukkum Pattanangalaiyum, Erusalemilum Leebanonilum Thaan Aalum Dhesamengum Thanakku Ishtamaanadhaiyellaam Kattinaan.
7 isravel Puththirar Sangaarampannaadhirundha Isravel Jaadhiyallaadha Eththiyar, Emoriyar, Perisiyar, Eviyar, Eboosiyaril Meedhiyaana Sagala Janaththilum,
8 avargalukkuppiragu Dhesaththilirundha Avargal Pillaigalai Saalomon Innaalvaraikkum Irukkirapadi Pagudhi Kattachcheydhaan.

9 isravel Puththiraril Oruvaraiyum Saalomon Than Velaiyai Seyya Adimaippaduththavillai; Avargal Yuththamanusharum, Avanudaiya Servaikkaararin Thalaivarum, Avanudaiya Radhangalukkum Kudhiraiveerarukkum Thalaivarumaayirundhaargal.
10 raajaavaagiya Saalomonudaiya Oozhiyakkaararin Thalaivaraagiya Ivargalil Irunootru Aimbadhuper Janaththai Aandaargal.

11 saalomon: Karththarudaiya Petti Vandha Sthalangal Parisuththamaayirukkiradhu; Aadhalaal, Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Dhaaveedhin Aramanaiyile En Manaivi Vaasampannalaagaadhu Endru Solli, Paarvonin Kumaaraththiyai Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththilirundhu Thaan Avalukkuk Kattina Maaligaikkuk Kudivarappanninaan.
12 adhumudharkondu Saalomon Thaan Mandabaththirku Munbaagak Kattiyirundha Karththarudaiya Palipeedaththinmel,

13 ovvoru Naalin Kattalaikkunthakkadhaai Moseyudaiya Karpanaiyinpadiye Oivunaatkalilum Maadhappirappugalilum, Varushaththil Moondrudharam Aasarikkira Pandigaigalaagiya Pulippillaadha Appappandigaiyilum, Vaarangalin Pandigaiyilum, Koodaarappandigaiyilum, Karththarukku Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalai Seluththinaan.

14 avan Than Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhudaiya Pramaanaththinpadiye, Aasaariyargal Thangal Thangal Oozhiyaththai Seyyum Vaguppugalaiyum, Leviyar Ovvoru Naalin Kattalaippadiye Thudhiththu Seviththu Aasaariyarukku Munbaagath Thangal Oozhiyaththai Seyyum Muraigalaiyum, Vaasal Kaappavargal Ovvoru Vaasalil Kaavalkaakkum Vaguppugalaiyum Nirkappanninaan; Dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Ippadik Kattalaiyittirundhaan.
15 sagala Kaariyaththaiyum Pokkishangalin Kaariyaththaiyum Kuriththu, Raajaa Aasaariyarukkum Leviyarukkum Koduththa Kattalaiyai Vittu Avargal Vilagaadhirundhaargal.
16 ippadiye Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukku Asthibaaram Podappatta Naalmudhal Adhai Mudikkumattum Saalomonin Velaiyellaam Nadandherikkarththarudaiya Aalayam Kattiththeerndhadhu.
17 pinbu Saalomon Edhomdhesaththuk Kadal Oraththilirukkum Esiyonkeperukkum Eloththukkum Ponaan.

18 avanukku Eeraam Than Oozhiyakkaarar Mugaandharamaaik Kappalgalaiyum, Samuththira Yaaththiraiyil Pazhagina Velaiyaatkalaiyum Anuppinaan; Avargal Saalomonin Velaikkaararodekooda Oppeerukkuppoi, Angeyirundhu Naanootru Aimbadhu Thaalandhu Ponnai Etri Raajaavaagiya Saalomonidaththil Konduvandhaargal.
